chunks.zh: Google pixel 手机质量真是堪忧
chunks.en: The quality of Google Pixel phones is truly worrying.

chunks.zh:
这三年，买了三个手机，一个 Pixel 6 Pro, 两个 Pixel 7a        
现状：   
Pixel 6 Pro 一直装在硅胶套中使用，在没有磕碰的情况下，左下角竟然裂开      
一个 Pixel 7a 放在凳子上，等我想去用的时候，发现无法点亮屏幕，adb devices 看到设备还在正常运行
chunks.en:
In the past three years, I bought three phones: one Pixel 6 Pro and two Pixel 7a.
Current situation:
The Pixel 6 Pro, which has always been used in a silicone case, cracked in the lower left corner without any bumps.
A Pixel 7a was placed on a stool, and when I wanted to use it, I found that the screen could not be lit. adb devices showed that the device was still running normally.

chunks.zh: 当初买 nexus 6p 伤透了心，后面不再买 pixel 了
chunks.en: I was heartbroken when I bought the Nexus 6P, so I won't buy Pixel phones anymore.

chunks.zh: 本来就是工业快消垃圾。半工业垃圾指的是 ibm 到联想过渡时期的 thinkpad ，依旧保留着工业模块化组装，哪坏拆哪换哪。pixel 时代已经是一体化的纯快消垃圾。早期的 pixel 5 代以前各代早期大货还各种硬件恶性问题（我主力依旧是这几代，后面的 pixel 我不再关心了，不清楚有什么问题），但 google 为了铺货和周期就急着出货了，反正 google 海外有免费售后政策，只是对 pixel 真爱都是折腾和隐私的，还有墙内垃圾佬，售后 0 。
chunks.en: It's just industrial fast-moving consumer goods garbage. Semi-industrial garbage refers to ThinkPads from the IBM to Lenovo transition period, which still retain industrial modular assembly where you disassemble and replace broken parts. The Pixel era is now monolithic pure fast-moving consumer goods garbage. Early Pixel generations before the 5th generation had various serious hardware problems (these generations are still my main devices, I don't care about later Pixels, and I don't know what problems they have), but Google rushed to ship them to meet delivery goals and deadlines. Anyway, Google has free after-sales service policies overseas, but Pixel fans in China are all about tinkering and privacy, and the after-sales service here is 0.

chunks.zh: 手持 6pro 回帖，pixel xl 目前还在服役备份相册
chunks.en: Replying with a 6 Pro in hand, the Pixel XL is still in service backing up albums.

chunks.zh: 安卓买三星，省心省力。
chunks.en: Buy Samsung for Android, it's worry-free and easy.

chunks.zh: > 一直装在硅胶套中使用 …… 左下角竟然裂开问题就出在这里。我和家人自 2018 年以来一直是按着索尼买，然后我什么都不用，不贴膜不上壳，就完全裸着用；对方则是又贴膜又带硅胶套。结果我的每一支索尼手机都完好无损（ XZ2 → Mark 3 ），然后她的则是每一支都会出问题（ XZ2 → Mark 2 → Mark 5; 其中 Mark 2 那代甚至换了两次荧幕……），而且也是像 OP 描述的那样，就是谁都没招惹它，自己就裂了。关键是我还手抖，手会经常抽一下，所以经常会掉东西，因此手机都不知道掉过多少次，XZ2 到后期边上都磕出小坑来了，荧幕也没裂。多次劝过说别用那个套，就是不听，然后就接着裂。所以劝 OP 下个手机试试别带套，别贴膜，看看能不能用得久一点。
chunks.en: > Always used in a silicone case... The problem of cracking in the lower left corner lies here. My family and I have been buying Sony phones since 2018, and I don't use anything, no screen protector or case, just completely bare; the other person uses both a screen protector and a silicone case. As a result, every one of my Sony phones is intact (XZ2 → Mark 3), and every one of hers has problems (XZ2 → Mark 2 → Mark 5; among them, the Mark 2 generation even had its screen replaced twice...). Moreover, it's just like OP described, no one provoked it, it just cracked itself. The key is that my hand trembles and twitches frequently, so I often drop things, and I don't know how many times the phone has been dropped. The sides of my XZ2 were chipped in the later stages, but the screen didn't crack. I've repeatedly advised her not to use that case, but she won't listen, and then it keeps cracking. So I advise OP to try not using a case or screen protector with your next phone to see if it lasts longer.

chunks.zh: @chutsetien 为什么用 硅胶套 会裂开 ，这个是什么原理 ？主要是防止掉地上摔了
chunks.en: @chutsetien Why does using a silicone case cause cracking? What is the principle behind this? It is mainly to prevent it from falling to the ground and breaking.

chunks.zh: @chutsetien 不贴膜，我觉得还科学，现在屏幕硬度比较强，一般都划不了
chunks.en: @chutsetien I think it's more scientific not to use a screen protector. The screen hardness is relatively strong now, so it generally can't be scratched.

chunks.zh: @wuruxu 我觉得可能跟持续受力有关系？硅胶套一般都和手机贴合得很紧，然后加上天气的变化、室内、室外、手机自身发热等可能会导致的硅胶套的热胀冷缩，或许会让手机一直受到一些不均衡的力？搞不好哪天就裂了。反正我们的实践结果就是如此，我的每一个手机都摔了很多次，都没事，她的反而有次真的就亲眼看着它裂开了，观赏了自我开裂的全过程……
chunks.en: @wuruxu I think it might be related to continuous stress? Silicone cases are generally very tightly fitted to the phone, and coupled with changes in the weather, indoor and outdoor environments, and the phone's own heat generation, which may cause the silicone case to expand and contract, perhaps the phone will always be subjected to some unbalanced force? Maybe it will crack one day. Anyway, our practical results are like this, every one of my phones has been dropped many times and is fine, but hers actually cracked once right in front of my eyes, and I witnessed the whole process of self-cracking...

chunks.zh: 用过 OG Pixel XL, P4XL, 2xP6P, 2xP7P, P8P, P9PXL 除了自己弄丢了一台摔碎了一块屏幕，其他还没因为质量问题挂掉的保修期内建议联系销售商，不然看看信用卡保险能不能 cover 这种
chunks.en: Used OG Pixel XL, P4XL, 2xP6P, 2xP7P, P8P, P9PXL. Except for losing one and breaking a screen, none of the others have failed due to quality issues. I suggest contacting the seller within the warranty period, or see if your credit card insurance can cover it.

chunks.zh: @Biggoldfish P6P 已经三年了，现在电池也不怎么耐用了，不值得去修
chunks.en: @Biggoldfish The P6P is already three years old, and the battery isn't very durable anymore. It's not worth repairing.

chunks.zh: 还是买一加好了。google 的手机都是参考设计用的。质量、性能、本土化特色这些都不行的。
chunks.en: It's better to buy a OnePlus phone. Google's phones are all based on reference designs; the quality, performance, and localized features are all not good.

chunks.zh: 屏幕不行，用了 8 个月直接脱胶了，我第一个 Pixel 7 就是屏幕直接脱落了，保修期没过 Google 给直接换了一个，然后换的 Pixel 7 前一阵也屏幕脱胶了，我只好用胶水自己粘上了。。
chunks.en: The screen is bad. After using it for 8 months, it came unglued. The screen of my first Pixel 7 just fell off. Google replaced it directly because it was still under warranty. Then, the screen of the replacement Pixel 7 also came unglued not long ago, so I had to glue it back on myself.

chunks.zh: 儿子要出国, 买了个,几天后充电后早晨就开不了了, 变砖了太耽误事情了对了,好像是印度产的
chunks.en: My son was going abroad, so I bought one, but after charging it a few days later, it wouldn't turn on in the morning and became a brick. It was a real hassle. By the way, it seems like it was made in India.

chunks.zh: 经历过 pixel 3xl 和 xperia 1 III ，两个手机都是半年后指纹就不灵了，xperia 据说是骁龙 888 太热给烤坏的。我不要求系统花里胡哨，但硬件和品质水平值不上那个价啊，尤其现在 Sony 把 4k 屏砍了，pixel 的 CPU 不给力，凭啥卖那么贵呢？
chunks.en: I've had the Pixel 3XL and Xperia 1 III. The fingerprint sensors of both phones stopped working after half a year. It's said that the Xperia's Snapdragon 888 got too hot and fried it. I don't need a fancy system, but the hardware and quality levels aren't worth the price. Especially now that Sony has cut the 4K screen, and the Pixel's CPU is weak, why are they selling it so expensively?

chunks.zh: @zhxhwyzh14 我的 6p 就是 cpu 虚焊废掉的，发热量太大，没有任何散热设计，品控又渣
chunks.en: @zhxhwyzh14 My 6P was wasted by CPU dry soldering. The heat generation was too high, there was no heat dissipation design, and the quality control was terrible.

chunks.zh: 从 nexus6 用到 pixel 3 ，亲儿子手机系统流畅，可以更新尝鲜新系统，但是特别易碎，每摔必碎。后来换了三星 s10+和 s22u ，摔了无数次都没事。。。
chunks.en: From Nexus 6 to Pixel 3, the Google phones had a smooth system, and you could update to try out the new system, but they were very fragile and broke every time they were dropped. Later, I switched to Samsung S10+ and S22U and dropped them countless times without any problems...

chunks.zh: Pixel 买了做测试机还行，日常用还是算了
chunks.en: Pixel is okay for buying as a test machine, but forget about using them as your daily driver.

chunks.zh: 这三年来起码买过 20 台新老 Pixel 机型了，都没碰到过你说的问题 🌚
chunks.en: I've bought at least 20 new and old Pixel models in the past three years, and I haven't encountered the problem you mentioned 🌚.

chunks.zh: Nexus 5 那个边框是最容易裂开的，像是长期暴晒老化的塑料袋，易粉碎但重量、尺寸和握持手感都是最棒的
chunks.en: The Nexus 5's bezel is the easiest to crack, like a plastic bag that has aged after long-term exposure. It's easily crushed, but the weight, size, and feel in the hand are the best.

chunks.zh: pixel 7a 一年半了 没问题 只有这一台
chunks.en: Pixel 7a for a year and a half, no problems, only this one.
